message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $9,000 is just a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $10,000?  I'm sure you'll agree this is still a great deal for you, and I'm willing to make it work.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
